replies.message: Go back to your room and take your medicine.
jesus is dead you dumbhead! and he was not god's son, god doesn't exist, you stupid!!!
and you will answer just as any human on this earth
and he will support all man gay and straight
HIP HIP HOORAY!!!  That will be the BEST celebration one could witness!  Praise God  HALLELUJAH!!!!
ermer you are right god is coming

You know I kind of wish he would come back. I would love to hear what he would have to say. I think he would support the rights of everyone, whether they are Christian or not.  To quote Mark Twain, "“If Christ were here there is one thing he would not be—a Christian.”
I hope he comes and tells you what a sorry excuse for a Christian you are.

Jesus message was all about love, loving and caring for others in this world. I hope He comes soon to see how much some so called 'Christians' have twisted His words around and altered the bible to fill people with fear and negativity! Jesus would welcome gays and lesbians more than any other people because of the suffering they have been through due to others ignorance! 'Therefore but for the Grace of God'.
I wish he would come, take all you brainwashed sheep right along with him.  Will be a much better world without you.
Josh why dont you go back to your room and give your boyfriend aids.
Jesus is among us walking in the Parade cuz Jesus loves All the Children in the World...maybe you missed the memo

you idiots have literally been saying that for the past 2000 years or so.
He was supposed to show up back in 2001, but he never showed
I'm looking forward to that day too @Ermer Rodriguez. Sick of this nonsense
Yep jesus loves all his children but he HATES the sin. YOU haven't got the memo lol...
yisus
I got the memo and he said I am safe soo Boo on you hater
Besides Caleb Bromley you are like just a kid...when you grow up then come at me with facts so till then
Caleb....go play in traffic, easy way to get your wish.
You guys can say anything you want im not here to argue.Just saying the truth,JESUS IS COMING SOON! so get your mind straight and start analyzing yourself,JESUS LOVES YOU!

1 Corinthians 6:9 Or do you not know that the unrighteous will not inherit the kingdom of God? Do not be deceived: neither the sexually immoral, nor idolaters, nor adulterers, nor men who practice homosexuality,3 10 nor thieves, nor the greedy, nor drunkards, nor revilers, nor swindlers will inherit the kingdom of God.

Sodom and Gomorrah is happening right now: Matthew 37-39 But as the days of Noah were, so shall also the coming of the Son of man be.38 For as in the days that were before the flood they were eating and drinking, marrying and giving in marriage, until the day that Noe entered into the ark,39 And knew not until the flood came, and took them all away; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be.
John 3:16  For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.JESUS LOVES YOU!
Jesus came last night...in my bed.  I had to kick him out in the morning to mow my lawn.  He is the best gardener in the world.

God is not an obligation and will no obligate you! Is your choice, say anything you want,i used to be as ignorant as you can imagine with my comments,until i stopped and thought let me try and see if its true,and trust me GOD is like the wind you cant see him but you can feel him.
